text:
Mural Size: For easy installation, this wallpaper mural is divided into 7 sections, each measuring 50 x 256 cm. The total size is 350 x 256 cm (width x height). This stunning wallpaper will captivate attention in any room! Add a touch of coziness to any interior space
ğŸ° Non-Woven Wallpaper: Our wallpaper murals are made from 220 g/mÂ² high-quality non-woven fabric, providing greater stability compared to other materials. After installation, there will be no deformation, air bubbles, wrinkles, or folds. Our wallpapers feature a smooth, highly resistant, and odourless surface
ğŸ° Wall Decoration: Our ecological photo wallpaper is Non-toxic and odourless. Featuring exquisite Marble Stone Stripes patterns, decorate your walls. it will transform your living room, bedroom, dining room, office. These wallpapers make innovative gifts for friends, family, colleagues, and children
ğŸ° Mural Assembly & Cleaning: Installing our mural wallpaper is a breeze! Simply apply the glue to the wall, not the wallpaper, then align and press each strip one after another. To clean, just gently wipe with a damp cloth. This ensures your wall stays beautiful for a long time
ğŸ° Custom Mural Service: We offer a unique personalized mural customization service, creating exclusive wallpaper murals tailored to your needs and preferences. Whether it's family photos, scenic views, or artworks, we can transform them into unique wall decorations. Simply provide the photos and dimensions you require
